title: Earning credits
content: Do we have special topic courses in 5th and 6th sem or are the 4 credits for third year earned through an internship only?

comments.body: I am unsure how things are now, but we had a special topic in 5th sem. 6th sem does not have one because it is replaced with capstone phase 1. During the summer after the third year, you can claim only 2 credits via summer internship and 4 credits via summer courses. Whatever remaining credit shortage you have needs to be covered using special topics spread across the 7th and 8th semesters.
Can I do 5th sem's special topic during the holidays after second year?
You can take up summer courses, which will add the required credits.
